channel.title: script on IT Talks
channel.description: Recent content in script on IT Talks

item.title: Reserved IP | Microsoft Azure
item.description:
If you need to reserve static ip address for your VM, follow the commands below:

1. Set static ip_:_

New-AzureReservedIP -ReservedIPName “postgresql” -Location “West US” 

2. Assign static ip_, defined above to VM named ** **__**postgresql**__ **–**__**vm**_

item.title: Error, some other host already uses address. Workaround
item.description: If you receive such message on your virtual machine, you have workaround to fix this problem.

item.title: Execute bash script by puppet
item.description:
We need to execute bash script on several servers. To do it manually – bad idea. But we have puppet. Lets make it by puppet.

  • Create bash script name.sh.
  • Create new manifest and apply it to our servers:
